mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(r.review_num) AS reviewCount FROM member1 m JOIN payment p ON m.memberIdx = p.memberIdx JOIN sales s ON p.payment_num = s.payment_num LEFT JOIN review r ON s.num = r.sales_num WHERE m.memberIdx = #{memberIdx}

SELECT r.review_num, r.content, r.grade, p.title, r.reg_date, pay.pay_amount, rp.s_filename AS review_img FROM review r JOIN sales s ON r.sales_num = s.num JOIN product p ON s.product_num = p.product_num JOIN payment pay ON s.payment_num = pay.payment_num LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT review_num, s_filename FROM ( SELECT review_num, s_filename, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY review_num ORDER BY reviewphoto_num ASC) rank FROM reviewphoto ) WHERE rank = 1 ) rp ON r.review_num = rp.review_num WHERE pay.memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( REVIEW_NUM, CONTENT, GRADE, PROJECT_NUM, SALES_NUM, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{review_num}, #{content}, #{grade}, #{project_num}, #{sales_num}, SYSDATE )
